original: Larson, Uno Otto, bruksdisponent, KalHnge, f. 9/1/8,2 i Asker, Örebro 1., av bruksäg. Oscar L. o. Helena Karlsson. G. 26 m. Hjördis Wetterberg. Barn: Helena f. 27. — Mog:ex. i Västerås 00, elev v. Filipstads bergssk. 01-02, bergshögsk. 04-05, stud. o. prakt, i Nordamer. 06-07. Ing. v. Hallsta-hammars A-B 02-04, rit. o. konstr. v. Morgårdshammars Mek. Verkst. A-B 05-06, ing. o-. disp:assist. v. Hall-stahammars A-B 08-11, övering. v. Kockums Jernv. A-B i Kallinge 11-15, disp. där sed. 15. Styr :ordf. i Ronneby Stuveri A-B, styr :led. i Kockums Jernv. A-B o. Hallstahammars A-B. Led. av Smål. o. Blek. handelskamm. arb:utsk. RVO, Landst:GM, Sv-FMSM.
translated: Larson, Uno Otto, mill manager, born 9/1/8,2 in Asker, Örebro 1st, son of mill owner Oscar L. and Helena Karlsson. Married on the 26th with Hjördis Wetterberg. Children: Helena born in 1927. Former spouse: divorced in Västerås in 1900. Attended Filipstad Mining School as a student from 1901-1902, then attended the College of Mining from 1904-1905. Studied and worked in North America from 1906-1907. Employed as an engineer at Hallsta-Hammars AB from 1902-1904, then as a draftsman and designer at Morgårdshammars Mekaniska Verkstad AB from 1905-1906. Engineer and assistant manager at Hallsta-Hammars AB from 1908-1911, then promoted to superintendent at Kockums Jernverk AB in Kallinge from 1911-1915, and currently serving as manager since then. Chairman of the board at Ronneby Stuveri AB, board member of Kockums Jernverk AB and Hallsta-Hammars AB. Member of the trade committees of Småland and Blekinge. Awarded the Royal Order of the Vasa (RVO), County Grand Master, member of the Swedish Society of Mining and Metallurgy (Sv-FMSM).

memberships.name: Swedish Society of Mining and Metallurgy (Sv-FMSM)
